front.title: Low-GWP non-flammable alternative refrigerant blends for HFC-134a

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: This project addresses the objectives of the Statement of Need number WPSON-17-02 for “No/Low Global Warming Potential Alternatives to Ozone Depleting Refrigerants” issued by the Strategic Environmental Research and Development Program (SERDP), the U.S. Department of Defense (DoD) environmental science and technology program, planned and executed in full partnership with the U.S. Department of Energy and the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency. The goal of this Statement of Need was to identify low global-warming-potential (GWP), non-flammable refrigerants to replace HFC-134a (GWP = 1300) in military equipment.

seriesInfo.name: NISTIR; NIST IR; NIST interagency report; NIST internal report
